title: Learning Design and Technology Integration Strategies for Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Science foundational theories and secondary education practical experience
context.additional_context: Online Real-Time Course for In-Service Secondary Science Teachers, Focusing on Enhancing Interactive Learning Design Competencies with Digital Tools

learning_goals: Learners can design science experiment simulations using various digital tools
Learners can plan and facilitate collaborative learning activities in real-time online environments
Learners can develop assessment rubrics by applying instructional design methodologies
Learners can analyze the pedagogical effectiveness of technology-based learning activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
